name: Zombies VS Werewolves
description:
Locked in a graveyard amidst the rising dead, your survival depends upon quick footwork and the occasional glimpses of moonlight that give you a chance to fight back.

~

Arrow keys to move. Survive as long as possible.

As a man, you must run from the dead. As a wolf, you must kill as many as you can before dawn breaks once more.
